abstract: Jon Tierney Findings column notes new research shows that while human emotion of envy can produce increased focus in individuals, it can also bring on a state of mental fatigue.
snippet: New experiments show an upside to coveting — along with one new reason to have a commandment against it.
lead_paragraph: New experiments show an upside to coveting — along with one new reason to have a commandment against it.

headline.main: Envy May Bear Fruit, but It Also Has an Aftertaste
headline.seo: An Upside to Envy, and a New Reason for That Commandment
headline.print_headline: Envy May Bear Fruit, but It Also Has an Aftertaste
